## Results

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

introns <- read_tsv("../code/ReferenceGenome/Annotations/GTFTools_BasicAnnotations/gencode.v34.chromasomal.introns.bed", col_names = c("chrom", "start", "stop", "gene", "transcript", "strand"))

introns %>%
  distinct(chrom, start, stop, strand, .keep_all=T) %>%
  mutate(len = stop- start) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=len)) +
  stat_ecdf() +
  scale_x_continuous(trans='log10')
```
